column2: Greater Alaska
We must expand to secure our position! To this end we must officially stake claim to lands surrounding us.
Claim Lorraine
We must claim Lorraine if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
Claim Luxemburg
We must claim Luxemburg if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
Claim Borderlands
We must claim the Borderlands if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
Claim Rheinland
We must claim the Rheinland if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
Claim Coast
We must claim Coast if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
Claim Northern France
We must claim Northern France if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
Accept the Belgians
We must accept the Belgians if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must pacify our minorities to defend ourselves.
Accept the French
We must accept the French if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must pacify our minorities to defend ourselves.
Claim Greater Korea
Now that we are independent from Chinese oppression, we must reclaim the land of the old Gojoseon, Goguryeo and Balhae empires.
Claim Land in the West
Now that we have established Banatia, we must claim land in the West to secure our position.
Claim Land in the East
Now that we have established Banatia, we must claim land in the East to secure our position.
Claim Belgrade
To weaken the Serbs who continue to claim our Land in the Vojvodina one of our politicians has proposed claiming their capital, namely Belgrade.
Claim Forte Sao Joaquim
To connect our lands in former British Guayana with Venezuela we must claim Forte Sao Joaquim
Claim the ABC islands
The ABC islands are a foreign base just off our northern coast and as such a threat to us. We must seize them for our own safety.
Claim Trinidad and Tobago
Trinidad and Tobago are foreign bases just off our northern coast and as such a threat to us. We must seize them for our own safety.
Claim Greater Luxemburg
We must claim land to grow strong enough to resist foreign invaders!
Claim Bregenz
If we want to accomplish anything we must annex land to increase our population!
Claim Great Vlachia
It is time for us to reclaim the land of our ancestors!
Claim some islands
If we are to restore christian rule to the holy land we must gain forward operating bases!
Claim Sardinia, Corsica and Sicily
If we are to restore christian rule to the holy land we must gain population centers to build an army!
Claim Crete, Cyprus and Aegean
If we are to restore christian rule to the holy land we must gain the islands closest to the holy land to prepare for an invasion!
Reverse Reconquista
We must retake our rightful land stolen from us in 1492 and teach those Spanish a lesson!
Claim Indian Ocean Islands
We must claim islands in the Indian ocean to make sure that colonizers don't use them to attack us.
Liberate all Mayas
We must strive to liberate all Mayas from foreign rule and unite them for the common cause!
Unite Siberia
We must unify the Siberian region if we wish to expand!
Claim the Mosquito Coast
With our legacy as the Viceroyalty of New Granada who administered the Mosquito Coast as a basis for our claim, we can now officially begin a territorial dispute on who is the rightful owner of it.
Greater Armenia
Now that we have secured our core lands we must strive to achieve a truly noble vision: All Armenians must be united in a Greater Armenian state.
Accept the Georgians

The Georgian peoples are not so different from us; They live in the same region, practice the same religion and have the same enemies. It would bring stability to our lands if we accepted them as citizens, though it will hurt our prestige to accept another culture.
Greater Kurdistan
Now that we have secured our core lands we must strive to achieve a truly noble vision: All Kurds must be united in a greater Kurdish state.
Greater Uruguay

To achieve true power we must expand. The provinces of Corrientes, Entre Rios, Rio Grande do Sul and Santa Catarina have expressed a desire to leave their respective countries and join a greater Uruguayan state.
Claim Dhofar
Dhofar is currently part of Muscat-Oman, yet it has the same people as our country. Why shouldn't we claim it?
Claim Dubai
We need to core Dubai to connect our lands.
Claim the Gulf
We must secure the Gulf to assert our position as a power to be reconned with.
